name: Seducer's Eyes
text: You gain a bonus on Charisma-based skill checks equal to 1 + 1 for every 4 caster levels you possess (to a maximum of +5), but only when interacting with those who might conceivably find you sexually attractive. You do not gain this bonus against those you or your allies are attacking or threatening.
text_zh: 这个法术可以增强你肉体的诱人程度。你在所有的基于魅力的技能检定上获得每4个施法者等级+1加值（最高为+5），但这个加值只在与对你可能有性趣的生物接触时才能生效。这个法术的效果对正在战斗或是威胁你和你的盟友的敌人无效。
